overview: In a desperate bid to repay her debts, a poor nursing student takes the advice of a friend and agrees to join an exclusive sugaring ring that pairs wealthy celebrities with beautiful young women. After getting in a fight with her outraged boyfriend, Penny winds up in the mansion of a powerful man and his kinky wife and makes the ultimate sacrifice to secure herself. But she is not alone. The very friend who got her into this lifestyle must make a sacrifice herself, especially if she wants to keep her rock star daddy happy. The celebrity has a taste for virgins and the only thing that will satisfy him is Jade's younger step-sister.
title: Sugar Babies: A Cautionary Tale
